person.persName: Albert Bridgeford (Frankfort, Kentucky, laborer and fugitive from justice.)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, laborer and fugitive from justice. Kentucky native. Son of Mary Bridgeford. Married to Margaret Frances Combs Bridgeford in 1847. Father of William Bridgeford, Ella Bridgeford, and Charles Bridgeford. Railroad laborer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Frankfort, Kentucky, in 1860. Resident of Franklin County in 1863. Charged with shooting Margaret F. Combs Bridgeford in Franklin County. Escaped from the Franklin County Jail on February 23, 1864. Fugitive from justice in February 1864.
